price: They have sold the verses of Allah for a small price and prevented [people] from His way[13]. Terrible is indeed what they have done!
arabic: ٱشۡتَرَوۡاْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ ثَمَنٗا قَلِيلٗا فَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُمۡ سَآءَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
footnotes: [13] In order to maintain their source of income, they barred their people from embracing Islam.
